title: Vehicle Start Methods
description:
Create:
1. Vehicle class with start() method returning "Starting vehicle"
2. Car class overriding start() to return "Turning key, engine starts"
3. Motorcycle class overriding start() to return "Kick-starting engine"
instructions:
Create:
1. Vehicle class with start() method returning "Starting vehicle"
2. Car class overriding start() to return "Turning key, engine starts"
3. Motorcycle class overriding start() to return "Kick-starting engine"

testCases.description:
Vehicle v = new Vehicle();
return v.start();

Car c = new Car();
return c.start();

Motorcycle m = new Motorcycle();
return m.start();

Vehicle v = new Car();
return v.start();

hints.text: Define a function using the java syntax. Don't forget the return statement if needed.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
